pages.text: Most settings for MIMI are configured either via the config file or the keybinds menu but there are some additional settings found elsewhere (well, currently just one :) ).

pages.title: MIMI Volume
pages.text: The global volume level for MIMI is currently tied to the 'Players' volume slider in the Minecraft options menu. Changing the volume of this slider will change the volume of all instrument sounds generated by MIMI.
